item.title: 根据发布的一份行政备忘录，佛罗里达大学已取消了该校所有的多元化、公平与包容（DEI）职位。

item.title: 克莱斯勒正在召回 33 万多辆吉普大切诺基，因为方向盘问题可能导致驾驶员失去对车辆的控制。

item.title: 无论纳税人喜欢与否，今年等待他们的变化包括更新的税级、新的税收抵免以及免费申报资格的扩大。
item.description:
Updated tax brackets, new tax credits and expanded eligibility for free filing are among the changes that await taxpayers this year — whether they like it or not.

item.title: 爱荷华大学球星凯特琳-克拉克（Caitlin Clark）打破了美国大学生篮球联赛（NCAA）历史得分纪录，成为她职业生涯的又一里程碑。
item.description:
University of Iowa star Caitlin Clark has reached another milestone in her career, breaking the NCAA all-time scoring record.

The 22-year-old surpassed "Pistol" Pete Maravich and now holds the record in both men's and women's Division I basketball. https://t.co/qF2fs10aaW pic.twitter.com/F5jVannMHY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）对如果她在共和党初选中输给特朗普，她是否会兑现支持共和党总统提名人的忠诚承诺表示怀疑："如果你说要背书，那你说的就是输。我不这么认为"。
item.description:
Nikki Haley hedged on whether she'll make good on her loyalty pledge to support the Republican presidential nominee if she loses the GOP primary to Trump: "If you talk about an endorsement, you're talking about a loss. I don't think like that." https://t.co/o2VPBVH8aK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 美国首次开始向加沙空投粮食援助--38,000 多份即食餐，以缓解 200 多万人日益严峻的处境。@TSoufiBurridge在此报道：
item.description:
For the first time, the U.S. began airdropping food aid into Gaza — more than 38,000 ready-to-eat meals to try and alleviate the increasingly dire situation for over 2 million people. @TSoufiBurridge reports.

More here: https://t.co/AF73QEiTUB pic.twitter.com/UHdmv6iGwd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 在一家美国技术公司提议在南印度洋进行新一轮搜索后，马来西亚政府可能会重新开始寻找失踪的马来西亚航空公司 MH370 航班，据信这架飞机十年前曾在该海域坠毁。
item.description:
Malaysia's government may renew the hunt for missing Malaysia Airlines flight MH370 after a U.S. technology firm proposed a fresh search in the southern Indian Ocean where the plane is believed to have crashed a decade ago. https://t.co/jnuJkrQG5L

item.title: 巴黎动物园迎来了由该园照顾的第一只雌性犀牛--3 岁大的 D'Ora。巴黎动物园的另外两头雄性犀牛也加入了这头犀牛的行列。
item.description:
The Paris zoo welcomed its first female rhino to be taken care by the park, a 3-year-old named D'Ora. The rhino is joined by the Paris park's two other male rhinos. https://t.co/GEUU19gUrO pic.twitter.com/z07Y93KH6O

item.title: 南非官员公布的新数据显示，2023 年南非全国共有 499 头犀牛被盗猎，比上一年增加了 51 头。

item.title: 参议员迈克-罗兹（Mike Rounds）在 "本周 "节目中说，米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）作为共和党参议院领袖的继任者必须既能与包括唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在内的下一任总统合作，又能 "坚持自己的立场"。
item.description:
Mitch McConnell's successor as Republican leader of the Senate must be able to both work with the next president, including Donald Trump, and "stand his own ground," Sen. Mike Rounds said on "This Week." https://t.co/P6HLK9m9KC

item.title: 一年一度的艾迪塔罗德（Iditarod）雪橇犬比赛是阿拉斯加州的官方体育项目，周六比赛正式开始，在共享的多用途雪道上进行训练时，雪橇犬与雪地摩托车相撞，造成五只雪橇犬死亡，八只雪橇犬受伤，比赛开始后，比赛开始注重安全问题。
item.description:
The Iditarod, the annual sled dog race celebrating Alaska's official state sport, got underway Saturday with a new focus on safety after five dogs died and eight were injured in collisions with snowmobiles while training on shared, multi-use trails. https://t.co/DQlsGJ2adH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 雷克斯-查普曼（Rex Chapman）在 NBA 打拼了十几年，但在此期间，他也在与毒瘾作斗争，这让他失去了人际关系、经济等等。
item.description:
Rex Chapman spent a dozen years with the NBA, but during that time he was also battling addictions that cost him relationships, finances and more.

In a new memoir, he explores his struggle and recovery. https://t.co/fukiyB9rg9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 一名妇女在被诊断出患有乳腺癌后冷冻了自己的卵子，她说自己现在正处于等待是否能将冷冻胚胎移植出阿拉巴马州的困境中，以实现成为母亲的目标。
item.description:
A woman who froze her eggs after being diagnosed with breast cancer said she is now stuck in limbo waiting to see if she can transfer her frozen embryos out of Alabama in order to fulfill her goal of becoming a mother. https://t.co/HOROL4sUMi

item.title: 教育部正在对奥瓦索公立学校（Owasso Public Schools）展开调查，根据该机构的一封信，非二元制学生奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在死亡前一天与其他几名学生发生了争吵。
item.description:
The Department of Education is opening an investigation into Owasso Public Schools where nonbinary student Nex Benedict got in a fight with several other students the day before they died, according to a letter from the agency. https://t.co/zUXfLn2GLy

item.title: 为什么香蕉似乎不受通货膨胀的影响？虽然通货膨胀推高了杂货店大多数货架的价格，但香蕉却令人印象深刻地抵御了农产品通胀，全国各地的消费者仍然可以买到香蕉：
item.description:
Why are bananas seemingly immune to inflation? While inflation has pushed prices up in most aisles of the grocery store, bananas have impressively defied produce inflation and remained accessible to consumers across the country.

Read more: https://t.co/oFyTqWWoDI pic.twitter.com/jTEgWDJK2S

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 悼念：2018年的这一天，英国运动员罗杰-班尼斯特爵士（Sir Roger Bannister）在英国牛津去世，享年88岁。
item.description:
IN MEMORIAM: On this day in 2018, Sir Roger Bannister, the British athlete who, while a medical student, became the first person to run a mile in under four minutes, died in Oxford, England at the age of 88. https://t.co/bSFD2PjYlA (edited) pic.twitter.com/Oo33bGOnfK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024
